title: Mid Seasonal Invitational
body: So, I heard this is going to be held in Tallahassee(Tallynasty as us at FSU call it) and let me first say I'm super excited and will hopefully attend. I have one major question though? Why did you choose this awful awful city there are so many homeless and the streets are terrible. Super excited still but why this place. Also, where is it going to be held?

replies.body: Well they wanted an East Coast Venue that has immediate International access. They probably wanted NYC, Boston, etc but could not get a venue of the size they needed for the length of time needed.
